text: @SecPompeo I’m deeply concerned about the spread of #coronavirus in #US and the public health risk to Americans & their neighbors! The U.S. offers NO humanitarian assistance to the people of the U.S. to help unmet needs in the lack of sufficient response efforts & by your denial it is hoax!
